Posts.Content: On 12/29/2007 Debbie_unsure wrote: After my cancer treament which was quite aggressive..I felt so lonely and lost and did not want to complain about any issue regarding lumps I found etc as I felt I was basically just kicked out for the new cancer patients and I do understand that for sure but don't forget about me and my worries afterward.(not intentionnally for sure) I looked forward to the attention and love I received at the Cancer clinic as it gave me hope and caring which I did not receive at home. I lost most of my hope when I went home and mentioned I was "cancer free" for now..my so callled partner in life felt I should just get back to being mistreated and take care og everything for him as he sat back and dran and insulted me I am quite sure I'm not alone in this. I do thank you for hearing me out..God Bless us all!! Debbie Thank you and I love you all and know u r quite busy but I am still human please and scared.:) P.S My Oncologist was always the greatest with me however, I'm the type of person to not go into too much detail as I know they are very busy for a great cause
Posts.Title: help

Posts.Content: On 12/30/2007 Molly s. wrote:   On 12/29/2007 Debbie_unsure wrote: After my cancer treament which was quite aggressive..I felt so lonely and lost and did not want to complain about any issue regarding lumps I found etc as I felt I was basically just kicked out for the new cancer patients and I do understand that for sure but don't forget about me and my worries afterward.(not intentionnally for sure) I looked forward to the attention and love I received at the Cancer clinic as it gave me hope and caring which I did not receive at home. I lost most of my hope when I went home and mentioned I was "cancer free" for now..my so callled partner in life felt I should just get back to being mistreated and take care og everything for him as he sat back and dran and insulted me I am quite sure I'm not alone in this. I do thank you for hearing me out..God Bless us all!! Debbie Thank you and I love you all and know u r quite busy but I am still human please and scared.:) P.S My Oncologist was always the greatest with me however, I'm the type of person to not go into too much detail as I know they are very busy for a great cause     I was very sad when I read your message. Please know that we all care and are ready to listen. Do you have a good family doctor? Talk to him/her...mine has been amazing. Is there a cancer support group in your area? I will be praying for you and your situation...
Posts.Title: help
